title: All eligible hutment dwellers taking part in the S
clause_text: All eligible hutment dwellers taking part in the S.R.S. shall have to be rehabilitated in accordance with the provisions of the Scheme. It may be in situ and in the same plot as far as possible.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
